name: BetterViewer
description: A browser extension for better image viewing experience

scripts.firefox-release: mv manifest.json manifest.json.chrome && mv manifest-firefox.json manifest.json && zip -r betterviewer-firefox.zip . -i "css/*" "dist/*" "help/*" "icons/*" "pages/*" "LICENSE" "background.js" "manifest.json" "CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md" "README.md" && mv manifest.json manifest-firefox.json && mv manifest.json.chrome manifest.json
scripts.release: npm run chrome-release && npm run firefox-release

author: Adem Kouki <ademkingnew@gmail.com> (https://github.com/Ademking/BetterViewer)
